content: Son of Stone is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). You can take on this boss as one of the last in the Foothills of Chapter 6 before you head off to the Water Curtain Cave.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Son_of_Stones.md", under the primary heading "Son of Stones". The content is presented below:

Son of Stone is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). You can take on this boss as one of the last in the Foothills of Chapter 6 before you head off to the Water Curtain Cave.
